abilities.name: Blood Pool
abilities.details:
When Nocturne kills an enemy with any of his abilities, he increases his [hp]maximum health[/] by a small amount permanently. Large minions, monsters and heroes' kills grant larger increase.

Nocturne uses his [db]health[/] to cast abilities instead of mana.

abilities.name: Vampiric Drain
abilities.details:
On Sword form, Nocturne stabs in a target direction, dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/] and [hp]maximum health[/]) to all enemies hit and [bf]healing[/] himself (scaling with [ap]magical power[/] plus a percentage of his [hp]missing health[/]).

On Staff form, Nocturne drains the blood from a target enemy for the next few seconds, dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/] and [hp]maximum health[/]) and [bf]heals[/] himself (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]). In addition, he also gains increased [ms]movement speed[/] during the cast.

abilities.name: Sanguine Sword / Sanguine Staff
abilities.details:
Nocturne shapeshifts his weapon into either a sword or a staff, gaining different abilities.

When switching to Sword form, his basic attack becomes shorter range but deals additional [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/] and [hp]maximum health[/]). In addition, his first basic attack within the first few seconds after shapeshifting will briefly [db]slow[/] the target.

When switching to Staff form, his basic attack gains additional [bf]range[/]. In addition, his first basic attack within the first few seconds after shapeshifting deals additional [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]) and reduces the targetâ€™s [db]magical resistance[/].

abilities.name: Death Grasp
abilities.details:
On Sword form, Nocturne dashes in a target direction and sends out a claw, pulling the first enemy hit to him and dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/] and [hp]maximum health[/]).

On Staff form, Nocturne summons a claw in a target direction, pulling all enemies within the path towards him and dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/] and [hp]maximum health[/]).

abilities.name: Night Feast
abilities.details:
Nocturne channels for a second then sends out a number of Blood Bat each second for the next few seconds. Each Blood Bat will attack a nearby enemy, dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/] and [hp]maximum health[/]).

On Sword form, each Blood Bat will return after each attack to [bf]heal[/] (scaling with [hp]maximum health[/]) him.

On Staff form, each Blood Bat will explode upon contact, dealing additional [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]) and briefly [db]fearing[/] the target. Each target can only be feared once during the Night Feast.

Blood Bat will prioritise enemy heroes first, then closer enemies.
